content.text:
Just installed #syncthing and while I'm loving my experience my first instinct is to figure out how to share my extra storage space, bandwidth, and other resources. My first thought is providing storage for people in my network, but I'd really rather not host any plaintext.

Anyone have a simple solution for sharing excess resources with friends who are stuck on Dropbox, Google Drive, Apple whatever, and other cloud storage systems?

#indieweb #self-hosted #p2p
